summary: A descent into hell, Jesper Ganslandt's disturbing and suspenseful second feature begins with a man waking up in unfamiliar surroundings, only to find the life he knew the day before is gone.
cast: Olle Sarri|Eva Rexed|Françoise Joyce|Sean Pietrulewicz|Niclas Gillis|Samuel Haus|Anders Johannisson|Thore Flygel|Lena Carlsson|Lennart Andersson|Teresa Afonsu|Mertil Ringquist|Jasmin Galijasevic|Marcus Vuoriniemi|Tuija Malmström|Eleonora Gröning|Göran Holm
keywords: male frontal nudity|downward spiral|male objectification|eastern europe|hell
title: Apan
